    Prevalence of hypertension, 2017 ACC/AHA definition

    prev_htn_accaha.Rmd

    Who is included in this analysis

    Hypertension

    Hypertension is a major risk factor for cardiovascular disease. More cardiovascular disease events in the United States have been attributed to hypertension than any other modifiable risk factor.

    Hypertension (2017 ACC/AHA BP guideline definition)

    The 2017 American College of Cardiology and American Heart Association (ACC/AHA) Guideline for the Prevention, Detection, Evaluation, and Management of High Blood Pressure (BP) in Adults defines hypertension as having a systolic BP â‰¥ 130 mm Hg or a diastolic BP â‰¥ 80 mm Hg.
